text: Sylvain Ducange (5 April 1963 - 8 June 2021) was a Haitian Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Port-au-Prince, Haiti. He was the Auxiliary Bishop of Port-au-Prince from 2016 until his death. Ducange died on 8 June 2021 in Mirebalais, Haiti from problems caused by COVID-19, aged 58.COVID-19: Hospitalisé depuis plusieurs jours, Mgr Ducange Sylvain est décédé ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Haitian people Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic
title: Sylvain Ducange
